ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] OMG SWG OVER EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh. I ve been so busy playing EQ I haven t had time to check my email. But I can quit anytime I want. really. ;-P My sister wants me to play SWG but I don t
ygData.messageBody:
Heh. I've been so busy playing EQ I haven't had time to check my email. But
I can quit anytime I want. really. ;-P
My sister wants me to play SWG but I don't want to.
luv,
-Su

> Well gee didnt i get in to the wrong grp i thought this was for eq
> players not SWG players im lookin for real crackheads that can play
> the game without making some kind of addiction out of it, i like the
> game but its not taking over my life.
>
> Qanaesin Truehearted
